cu.explanation_en: Setting gNB_ID to a negative value -1 will cause invalid identification and prevent proper gNB registration in the network.

du.explanation_en: Setting dl_carrierBandwidth to 300 (exceeding valid range) will cause bandwidth configuration errors and downlink transmission failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 dl_carrierBandwidth 設定為 300（超出有效範圍）會導致頻寬配置錯誤和下行鏈路傳輸失敗。
